description: Hardside luggage — AKA hard luggage or hard-shell luggage — refers to its sturdy, non-flexible shell. The ideal exterior material is polycarbonate, a thermoplastic polymer famed for its lightweight nature and impressive durability. Cheaper ABS plastics provide less protection at a lower cost, while aluminium offers optimal strength with added weight and expense.
